attributes.comment:
I have heard that you plan on increasing the fee for the I-600A to $670 as well as increasing the
biometrics fees. As I am sure you have heard, adoption from China, the largest international
adoption program here in the U.S., has extended the normal wait time for thousands of waiting
adoptive families. As a result, renewal of the I-600A is necessary. This enormously large
population of adoptive families has repeatedly petitioned the USCIS & the US Government to
either extend the length of validity time of the 171H or to lower the fees associated with renewing
it.

I am very angry to hear that you not only do not care about the financial burden this places on
people trying to build a family but you are considering increasing that burden. Shame, shame,
shame, on you for not listening to us and for seemingly not caring.

I am hoping my voice is heard here against your proposed fee increases.

Shannon Yates
waiting parent for a daughter from China
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Shannon Yates
